meanings.definition: A rare silicate mineral with the formula (K,Na,Ca)2(Al,Si)4O8(OH)2·2H2O. It is a hydrated phyllosilicate, related to zeolites.
meanings.english_definition: A rare silicate mineral with the formula (K,Na,Ca)2(Al,Si)4O8(OH)2·2H2O. It is a hydrated phyllosilicate, related to zeolites.

examples.sentence: The Comptonite specimen was found in the basaltic rocks.
examples.translation: コンプトナイトの標本は玄武岩の中で発見されました。

etymology.value: Named after Arthur Holly Compton (1892-1962), an American physicist who won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1927 for his discovery of the Compton effect.
